00028 
00049 UNS8 buildPDO (CO_Data * d, UNS8 numPdo, Message * pdo)
00050 {
00051   const indextable *TPDO_com = d->objdict + d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS + numPdo;
00052   const indextable *TPDO_map = d->objdict + d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS_MAP + numPdo;
00053 
00054   UNS8 prp_j = 0x00;
00055   UNS32 offset = 0x00000000;
00056   const UNS8 *pMappingCount = (UNS8 *) TPDO_map->pSubindex[0].pObject;
00057 
00058   pdo->cob_id = UNS16_LE(*(UNS32*)TPDO_com->pSubindex[1].pObject & 0x7FF);
00059   pdo->rtr = NOT_A_REQUEST;
00060 
00061   MSG_WAR (0x3009, "  PDO CobId is : ",
00062            *(UNS32 *) TPDO_com->pSubindex[1].pObject);
00063   MSG_WAR (0x300D, "  Number of objects mapped : ", *pMappingCount);
00064 
00065   do
00066     {
00067       UNS8 dataType;            /* Unused */
00068       UNS8 tmp[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };  /* temporary space to hold bits */
00069 
00070       /* pointer fo the var which holds the mapping parameter of an mapping entry  */
00071       UNS32 *pMappingParameter =
00072         (UNS32 *) TPDO_map->pSubindex[prp_j + 1].pObject;
00073       UNS16 index = (UNS16) ((*pMappingParameter) >> 16);
00074       UNS32 Size = (UNS32) (*pMappingParameter & (UNS32) 0x000000FF);     /* Size in bits */
00075 
00076       /* get variable only if Size != 0 and Size is lower than remaining bits in the PDO */
00077       if (Size && ((offset + Size) <= 64))
00078         {
00079           UNS32 ByteSize = 1 + ((Size - 1) >> 3);        /*1->8 => 1 ; 9->16 => 2, ... */
00080           UNS8 subIndex =
00081             (UNS8) (((*pMappingParameter) >> (UNS8) 8) & (UNS32) 0x000000FF);
00082 
00083           MSG_WAR (0x300F, "  got mapping parameter : ", *pMappingParameter);
00084           MSG_WAR (0x3050, "    at index : ", TPDO_map->index);
00085           MSG_WAR (0x3051, "    sub-index : ", prp_j + 1);
00086 
00087           if (getODentry (d, index, subIndex, tmp, &ByteSize, &dataType, 0) !=
00088               OD_SUCCESSFUL)
00089             {
00090               MSG_ERR (0x1013,
00091                        " Couldn't find mapped variable at index-subindex-size : ",
00092                        (UNS16) (*pMappingParameter));
00093               return 0xFF;
00094             }
00095           /* copy bit per bit in little endian */
00096           CopyBits ((UNS8) Size, ((UNS8 *) tmp), 0, 0,
00097                     (UNS8 *) & pdo->data[offset >> 3], (UNS8)(offset % 8), 0);
00098 
00099           offset += Size;
00100         }
00101       prp_j++;
00102     }
00103   while (prp_j < *pMappingCount);
00104 
00105   pdo->len = (UNS8)(1 + ((offset - 1) >> 3));
00106 
00107   MSG_WAR (0x3015, "  End scan mapped variable", 0);
00108 
00109   return 0;
00110 }
00111 
00120 UNS8
00121 sendPDOrequest (CO_Data * d, UNS16 RPDOIndex)
00122 {
00123   UNS32 *pwCobId;
00124   UNS16 offset = d->firstIndex->PDO_RCV;
00125   UNS16 lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_RCV;
00126 
00127   if (!d->CurrentCommunicationState.csPDO)
00128     {
00129       return 0;
00130     }
00131 
00132   /* Sending the request only if the cobid have been found on the PDO
00133      receive */
00134   /* part dictionary */
00135 
00136   MSG_WAR (0x3930, "sendPDOrequest RPDO Index : ", RPDOIndex);
00137 
00138   if (offset && RPDOIndex >= 0x1400)
00139     {
00140       offset += RPDOIndex - 0x1400;
00141       if (offset <= lastIndex)
00142         {
00143           /* get the CobId */
00144           pwCobId = d->objdict[offset].pSubindex[1].pObject;
00145 
00146           MSG_WAR (0x3930, "sendPDOrequest cobId is : ", *pwCobId);
00147           {
00148             Message pdo;
00149             pdo.cob_id = (UNS16)UNS16_LE(*pwCobId);
00150             pdo.rtr = REQUEST;
00151             pdo.len = 0;
00152             return canSend (d->canHandle, &pdo);
00153           }
00154         }
00155     }
00156   MSG_ERR (0x1931, "sendPDOrequest : RPDO Index not found : ", RPDOIndex);
00157   return 0xFF;
00158 }

00169 UNS8
00170 proceedPDO (CO_Data * d, Message * m)
00171 {
00172   UNS8 numPdo;
00173   UNS8 numMap;                  /* Number of the mapped varable */
00174   UNS8 *pMappingCount = NULL;   /* count of mapped objects... */
00175   /* pointer to the var which is mapped to a pdo... */
00176   /*  void *     pMappedAppObject = NULL;   */
00177   /* pointer fo the var which holds the mapping parameter of an
00178      mapping entry */
00179   UNS32 *pMappingParameter = NULL;
00180   UNS8 *pTransmissionType = NULL;       /* pointer to the transmission
00181                                            type */
00182   UNS32 *pwCobId = NULL;
00183   UNS8 Size;
00184   UNS8 offset;
00185   UNS8 status;
00186   UNS32 objDict;
00187   UNS16 offsetObjdict;
00188   UNS16 lastIndex;
00189 
00190   status = state2;
00191 
00192   MSG_WAR (0x3935, "proceedPDO, cobID : ", (UNS16_LE(m->cob_id) & 0x7ff));
00193   offset = 0x00;
00194   numPdo = 0;
00195   numMap = 0;
00196   if ((*m).rtr == NOT_A_REQUEST)
00197     {                           /* The PDO received is not a
00198                                    request. */
00199 
00200       offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_RCV;
00201       lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_RCV;
00202 
00203       /* study of all the PDO stored in the dictionary */
00204       if (offsetObjdict)
00205         while (offsetObjdict <= lastIndex)
00206           {
00207 
00208             switch (status)
00209               {
00210 
00211               case state2:
00212                 /* get CobId of the dictionary correspondant to the received
00213                    PDO */
00214                 pwCobId =
00215                   d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[1].pObject;
00216                 /* check the CobId coherance */
00217                 /*pwCobId is the cobId read in the dictionary at the state 3
00218                  */
00219                 if (*pwCobId == UNS16_LE(m->cob_id))
00220                   {
00221                     /* The cobId is recognized */
00222                     status = state4;
00223                     MSG_WAR (0x3936, "cobId found at index ",
00224                              0x1400 + numPdo);
00225                     break;
00226                   }
00227                 else
00228                   {
00229                     /* cobId received does not match with those write in the
00230                        dictionnary */
00231                     numPdo++;
00232                     offsetObjdict++;
00233                     status = state2;
00234                     break;
00235                   }
00236 
00237               case state4:     /* Get Mapped Objects Number */
00238                 /* The cobId of the message received has been found in the
00239                    dictionnary. */
00240                 offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_RCV_MAP;
00241                 lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_RCV_MAP;
00242                 pMappingCount =
00243                   (UNS8 *) (d->objdict + offsetObjdict +
00244                             numPdo)->pSubindex[0].pObject;
00245                 numMap = 0;
00246                 while (numMap < *pMappingCount)
00247                   {
00248                     UNS8 tmp[] = { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00249                     UNS32 ByteSize;
00250                     pMappingParameter =
00251                       (UNS32 *) (d->objdict + offsetObjdict +
00252                                  numPdo)->pSubindex[numMap + 1].pObject;
00253                     if (pMappingParameter == NULL)
00254                       {
00255                         MSG_ERR (0x1937, "Couldn't get mapping parameter : ",
00256                                  numMap + 1);
00257                         return 0xFF;
00258                       }
00259                     /* Get the addresse of the mapped variable. */
00260                     /* detail of *pMappingParameter : */
00261                     /* The 16 hight bits contains the index, the medium 8 bits
00262                        contains the subindex, */
00263                     /* and the lower 8 bits contains the size of the mapped
00264                        variable. */
00265 
00266                     Size = (UNS8) (*pMappingParameter & (UNS32) 0x000000FF);
00267 
00268                     /* set variable only if Size != 0 and 
00269                      * Size is lower than remaining bits in the PDO */
00270                     if (Size && ((offset + Size) <= (m->len << 3)))
00271                       {
00272                         /* copy bit per bit in little endian */
00273                         CopyBits (Size, (UNS8 *) & m->data[offset >> 3],
00274                                   offset % 8, 0, ((UNS8 *) tmp), 0, 0);
00275                         /*1->8 => 1 ; 9->16 =>2, ... */
00276                         ByteSize = (UNS32)(1 + ((Size - 1) >> 3));
00277 
00278                         objDict =
00279                           setODentry (d, (UNS16) ((*pMappingParameter) >> 16),
00280                                       (UNS8) (((*pMappingParameter) >> 8) &
00281                                               0xFF), tmp, &ByteSize, 0);
00282 
00283                         if (objDict != OD_SUCCESSFUL)
00284                           {
00285                             MSG_ERR (0x1938,
00286                                      "error accessing to the mapped var : ",
00287                                      numMap + 1);
00288                             MSG_WAR (0x2939, "         Mapped at index : ",
00289                                      (*pMappingParameter) >> 16);
00290                             MSG_WAR (0x2940, "                subindex : ",
00291                                      ((*pMappingParameter) >> 8) & 0xFF);
00292                             return 0xFF;
00293                           }
00294 
00295                         MSG_WAR (0x3942,
00296                                  "Variable updated by PDO cobid : ",
00297                                  UNS16_LE(m->cob_id));
00298                         MSG_WAR (0x3943, "         Mapped at index : ",
00299                                  (*pMappingParameter) >> 16);
00300                         MSG_WAR (0x3944, "                subindex : ",
00301                                  ((*pMappingParameter) >> 8) & 0xFF);
00302                         offset += Size;
00303                       }
00304                     numMap++;
00305                   }             /* end loop while on mapped variables */
00306 
00307                 return 0;
00308 
00309               }                 /* end switch status */
00310           }                     /* end while */
00311     }                           /* end if Donnees */
00312   else if ((*m).rtr == REQUEST)
00313     {
00314       MSG_WAR (0x3946, "Receive a PDO request cobId : ", UNS16_LE(m->cob_id));
00315       status = state1;
00316       offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS;
00317       lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_TRS;
00318       if (offsetObjdict)
00319         while (offsetObjdict <= lastIndex)
00320           {
00321             /* study of all PDO stored in the objects dictionary */
00322 
00323             switch (status)
00324               {
00325 
00326               case state1:     /* check the CobId */
00327                 /* get CobId of the dictionary which match to the received PDO
00328                  */
00329                 pwCobId =
00330                    (d->objdict +
00331                              offsetObjdict)->pSubindex[1].pObject;
00332                 if (*pwCobId == UNS16_LE(m->cob_id))
00333                   {
00334                     status = state4;
00335                     break;
00336                   }
00337                 else
00338                   {
00339                     numPdo++;
00340                     offsetObjdict++;
00341                   }
00342                 status = state1;
00343                 break;
00344 
00345 
00346               case state4:     /* check transmission type */
00347                 pTransmissionType =
00348                   (UNS8 *) d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[2].pObject;
00349                 /* If PDO is to be sampled and send on RTR, do it */
00350                 if ((*pTransmissionType == TRANS_RTR))
00351                   {
00352                     status = state5;
00353                     break;
00354                   }
00355                 /* RTR_SYNC means data prepared at SYNC, transmitted on RTR */
00356                 else if ((*pTransmissionType == TRANS_RTR_SYNC))
00357                   {
00358                     if (d->PDO_status[numPdo].
00359                         transmit_type_parameter & PDO_RTR_SYNC_READY)
00360                       {
00361                         /*Data ready, just send */
00362                         canSend (d->canHandle,
00363                                  &d->PDO_status[numPdo].last_message);
00364                         return 0;
00365                       }
00366                     else
00367                       {
00368                         /* if SYNC did never occur, transmit current data */
00369                         /* DS301 do not tell what to do in such a case... */
00370                         MSG_ERR (0x1947,
00371                                  "Not ready RTR_SYNC TPDO send current data : ",
00372                                  UNS16_LE(m->cob_id));
00373                         status = state5;
00374                       }
00375                     break;
00376                   }
00377                 else if ((*pTransmissionType == TRANS_EVENT_PROFILE) ||
00378                          (*pTransmissionType == TRANS_EVENT_SPECIFIC))
00379                   {
00380                     /* Zap all timers and inhibit flag */
00381                     d->PDO_status[numPdo].event_timer =
00382                       DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[numPdo].event_timer);
00383                     d->PDO_status[numPdo].inhibit_timer =
00384                       DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[numPdo].inhibit_timer);
00385                     d->PDO_status[numPdo].transmit_type_parameter &=
00386                       ~PDO_INHIBITED;
00387                     /* Call  PDOEventTimerAlarm for this TPDO, 
00388                      * this will trigger emission et reset timers */
00389                     PDOEventTimerAlarm (d, numPdo);
00390                     return 0;
00391                   }
00392                 else
00393                   {
00394                     /* The requested PDO is not to send on request. So, does
00395                        nothing. */
00396                     MSG_WAR (0x2947, "PDO is not to send on request : ",
00397                              UNS16_LE(m->cob_id));
00398                     return 0xFF;
00399                   }
00400 
00401               case state5:     /* build and send requested PDO */
00402                 {
00403                   Message pdo;
00404                   if (buildPDO (d, numPdo, &pdo))
00405                     {
00406                       MSG_ERR (0x1948, " Couldn't build TPDO n�", numPdo);
00407                       return 0xFF;
00408                     }
00409                   canSend (d->canHandle, &pdo);
00410                   return 0;
00411                 }
00412               }                 /* end switch status */
00413           }                     /* end while */
00414     }                           /* end if Requete */
00415 
00416   return 0;
00417 }
00418 
00430 void
00431 CopyBits (UNS8 NbBits, UNS8 * SrcByteIndex, UNS8 SrcBitIndex,
00432           UNS8 SrcBigEndian, UNS8 * DestByteIndex, UNS8 DestBitIndex,
00433           UNS8 DestBigEndian)
00434 {
00435   /* This loop copy as many bits that it can each time, crossing */
00436   /* successively bytes */
00437   // boundaries from LSB to MSB.
00438   while (NbBits > 0)
00439     {
00440       /* Bit missalignement between src and dest */
00441       INTEGER8 Vect = DestBitIndex - SrcBitIndex;
00442 
00443       /* We can now get src and align it to dest */
00444       UNS8 Aligned =
00445         Vect > 0 ? *SrcByteIndex << Vect : *SrcByteIndex >> -Vect;
00446 
00447       /* Compute the nb of bit we will be able to copy */
00448       UNS8 BoudaryLimit = (Vect > 0 ? 8 - DestBitIndex : 8 - SrcBitIndex);
00449       UNS8 BitsToCopy = BoudaryLimit > NbBits ? NbBits : BoudaryLimit;
00450 
00451       /* Create a mask that will serve in: */
00452       UNS8 Mask =
00453         ((0xff << (DestBitIndex + BitsToCopy)) |
00454          (0xff >> (8 - DestBitIndex)));
00455 
00456       /* - Filtering src */
00457       UNS8 Filtered = Aligned & ~Mask;
00458 
00459       /* - and erase bits where we write, preserve where we don't */
00460       *DestByteIndex &= Mask;
00461 
00462       /* Then write. */
00463       *DestByteIndex |= Filtered;
00464 
00465       /*Compute next time cursors for src */
00466       if ((SrcBitIndex += BitsToCopy) > 7)      /* cross boundary ? */
00467         {
00468           SrcBitIndex = 0;      /* First bit */
00469           SrcByteIndex += (SrcBigEndian ? -1 : 1);      /* Next byte */
00470         }
00471 
00472 
00473       /*Compute next time cursors for dest */
00474       if ((DestBitIndex += BitsToCopy) > 7)
00475         {
00476           DestBitIndex = 0;     /* First bit */
00477           DestByteIndex += (DestBigEndian ? -1 : 1);    /* Next byte */
00478         }
00479 
00480       /*And decrement counter. */
00481       NbBits -= BitsToCopy;
00482     }
00483 
00484 }
00485 
00486 static void sendPdo(CO_Data * d, UNS32 pdoNum, Message * pdo)
00487 {
00488   /*store_as_last_message */
00489   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message = *pdo;
00490   MSG_WAR (0x396D, "sendPDO cobId :", UNS16_LE(pdo.cob_id));
00491   MSG_WAR (0x396E, "     Nb octets  : ", pdo.len);
00492 
00493   canSend (d->canHandle, pdo);
00494 }

00496 
00505 UNS8
00506 sendPDOevent (CO_Data * d)
00507 {
00508   /* Calls _sendPDOevent specifying it is not a sync event */
00509   return _sendPDOevent (d, 0);
00510 }
00511 
00512 UNS8
00513 sendOnePDOevent (CO_Data * d, UNS32 pdoNum)
00514 {
00515   UNS16 offsetObjdict;
00516   Message pdo;
00517   if (!d->CurrentCommunicationState.csPDO ||
00518       (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter & PDO_INHIBITED))
00519     {
00520       return 0;
00521     }
00522 
00523   offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS + pdoNum;
00524   MSG_WAR (0x3968, "  PDO is on EVENT. Trans type : ",
00525            *pTransmissionType);
00526   
00527   memset(&pdo, 0, sizeof(pdo));
00528   if (buildPDO (d, pdoNum, &pdo))
00529     {
00530       MSG_ERR (0x3907, " Couldn't build TPDO number : ",
00531                pdoNum);
00532       return 0;
00533     }
00534 
00535   /*Compare new and old PDO */
00536   if (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message.cob_id == pdo.cob_id
00537       && d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message.len == pdo.len
00538       && memcmp(d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message.data,
00539                                         pdo.data, 8) == 0
00540     )
00541     {
00542       /* No changes -> go to next pdo */
00543       return 0;
00544     }
00545   else
00546     {
00547 
00548       TIMEVAL EventTimerDuration;
00549       TIMEVAL InhibitTimerDuration;
00550 
00551       MSG_WAR (0x306A, "Changes TPDO number : ", pdoNum);
00552       /* Changes detected -> transmit message */
00553       EventTimerDuration =
00554         *(UNS16 *) d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[5].
00555         pObject;
00556       InhibitTimerDuration =
00557         *(UNS16 *) d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[3].
00558         pObject;
00559 
00560       /* Start both event_timer and inhibit_timer */
00561       if (EventTimerDuration)
00562         {
00563           DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].event_timer);
00564           d->PDO_status[pdoNum].event_timer =
00565             SetAlarm (d, pdoNum, &PDOEventTimerAlarm,
00566                       MS_TO_TIMEVAL (EventTimerDuration), 0);
00567         }
00568 
00569       if (InhibitTimerDuration)
00570         {
00571           DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].inhibit_timer);
00572           d->PDO_status[pdoNum].inhibit_timer =
00573             SetAlarm (d, pdoNum, &PDOInhibitTimerAlarm,
00574                       US_TO_TIMEVAL (InhibitTimerDuration *
00575                                      100), 0);
00576           /* and inhibit TPDO */
00577           d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter |=
00578             PDO_INHIBITED;
00579         }
00580 
00581       sendPdo(d, pdoNum, &pdo);
00582     }
00583     return 1;
00584 }
00585 
00586 void
00587 PDOEventTimerAlarm (CO_Data * d, UNS32 pdoNum)
00588 {
00589   /* This is needed to avoid deletion of re-attribuated timer */
00590   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].event_timer = TIMER_NONE;
00591   /* force emission of PDO by artificially changing last emitted */
00592   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message.cob_id = 0;
00593   sendOnePDOevent (d, pdoNum);
00594 }
00595 
00596 void
00597 PDOInhibitTimerAlarm (CO_Data * d, UNS32 pdoNum)
00598 {
00599   /* This is needed to avoid deletion of re-attribuated timer */
00600   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].inhibit_timer = TIMER_NONE;
00601   /* Remove inhibit flag */
00602   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter &= ~PDO_INHIBITED;
00603   sendOnePDOevent (d, pdoNum);
00604 }
00605 
00615 UNS8
00616 _sendPDOevent (CO_Data * d, UNS8 isSyncEvent)
00617 {
00618   UNS8 pdoNum = 0x00;           /* number of the actual processed pdo-nr. */
00619   UNS8 *pTransmissionType = NULL;
00620   UNS8 status = state3;
00621   UNS16 offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS;
00622   UNS16 offsetObjdictMap = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS_MAP;
00623   UNS16 lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_TRS;
00624 
00625   if (!d->CurrentCommunicationState.csPDO)
00626     {
00627       return 0;
00628     }
00629 
00630 
00631   /* study all PDO stored in the objects dictionary */
00632   if (offsetObjdict)
00633     {
00634       Message pdo;/* = Message_Initializer;*/
00635       memset(&pdo, 0, sizeof(pdo));
00636       while (offsetObjdict <= lastIndex)
00637         {
00638           switch (status)
00639             {
00640             case state3:
00641               if ( /* bSubCount always 5 with objdictedit -> check disabled */
00642                    /*d->objdict[offsetObjdict].bSubCount < 5 ||*/
00643                    /* check if TPDO is not valid */
00644                    *(UNS32 *) d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[1].
00645                    pObject & 0x80000000)
00646                 {
00647                   MSG_WAR (0x3960, "Not a valid PDO ", 0x1800 + pdoNum);
00648                   /*Go next TPDO */
00649                   status = state11;
00650                   break;
00651                 }
00652               /* get the PDO transmission type */
00653               pTransmissionType =
00654                 (UNS8 *) d->objdict[offsetObjdict].pSubindex[2].pObject;
00655               MSG_WAR (0x3962, "Reading PDO at index : ", 0x1800 + pdoNum);
00656 
00657               /* check if transmission type is SYNCRONOUS */
00658               /* message transmited every n SYNC with n=TransmissionType */
00659               if (isSyncEvent &&
00660                   (*pTransmissionType >= TRANS_SYNC_MIN) &&
00661                   (*pTransmissionType <= TRANS_SYNC_MAX) &&
00662                   (++d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter ==
00663                    *pTransmissionType))
00664                 {
00665                   /*Reset count of SYNC */
00666                   d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter = 0;
00667                   MSG_WAR (0x3964, "  PDO is on SYNCHRO. Trans type : ",
00668                            *pTransmissionType);
00669                   memset(&pdo, 0, sizeof(pdo));
00670                   /*{
00671                     Message msg_init = Message_Initializer;
00672                     pdo = msg_init;
00673                   }*/
00674                   if (buildPDO (d, pdoNum, &pdo))
00675                     {
00676                       MSG_ERR (0x1906, " Couldn't build TPDO number : ",
00677                                pdoNum);
00678                       status = state11;
00679                       break;
00680                     }
00681                   status = state5;
00682                   /* If transmission RTR, with data sampled on SYNC */
00683                 }
00684               else if (isSyncEvent && (*pTransmissionType == TRANS_RTR_SYNC))
00685                 {
00686                   if (buildPDO
00687                       (d, pdoNum, &d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message))
00688                     {
00689                       MSG_ERR (0x1966, " Couldn't build TPDO number : ",
00690                                pdoNum);
00691                       d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter &=
00692                         ~PDO_RTR_SYNC_READY;
00693                     }
00694                   else
00695                     {
00696                       d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter |=
00697                         PDO_RTR_SYNC_READY;
00698                     }
00699                   status = state11;
00700                   break;
00701                   /* If transmission on Event and not inhibited, check for changes */
00702                 }
00703               else
00704                 if ( (isSyncEvent && (*pTransmissionType == TRANS_SYNC_ACYCLIC))
00705                      ||
00706                      (!isSyncEvent && (*pTransmissionType == TRANS_EVENT_PROFILE || *pTransmissionType == TRANS_EVENT_SPECIFIC)
00707                        && !(d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter & PDO_INHIBITED)))
00708                 {
00709                   sendOnePDOevent(d, pdoNum);
00710                   status = state11;
00711                 }
00712               else
00713                 {
00714                   MSG_WAR (0x306C,
00715                            "  PDO is not on EVENT or synchro or not at this SYNC. Trans type : ",
00716                            *pTransmissionType);
00717                   status = state11;
00718                 }
00719               break;
00720             case state5:       /*Send the pdo */
00721               sendPdo(d, pdoNum, &pdo);
00722               status = state11;
00723               break;
00724             case state11:      /*Go to next TPDO */
00725               pdoNum++;
00726               offsetObjdict++;
00727               offsetObjdictMap++;
00728               MSG_WAR (0x3970, "next pdo index : ", pdoNum);
00729               status = state3;
00730               break;
00731 
00732             default:
00733               MSG_ERR (0x1972, "Unknown state has been reached : %d", status);
00734               return 0xFF;
00735             }                   /* end switch case */
00736 
00737         }                       /* end while */
00738     }
00739   return 0;
00740 }
00741 
00751 UNS32
00752 TPDO_Communication_Parameter_Callback (CO_Data * d,
00753                                        const indextable * OD_entry,
00754                                        UNS8 bSubindex)
00755 {
00756   /* If PDO are actives */
00757   if (d->CurrentCommunicationState.csPDO)
00758     switch (bSubindex)
00759       {
00760       case 2:                  /* Changed transmition type */
00761       case 3:                  /* Changed inhibit time */
00762       case 5:                  /* Changed event time */
00763         {
00764           const indextable *TPDO_com = d->objdict + d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS;
00765           UNS8 numPdo = OD_entry - TPDO_com;    /* number of the actual processed pdo-nr. */
00766 
00767           /* Zap all timers and inhibit flag */
00768           d->PDO_status[numPdo].event_timer =
00769             DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[numPdo].event_timer);
00770           d->PDO_status[numPdo].inhibit_timer =
00771             DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[numPdo].inhibit_timer);
00772           d->PDO_status[numPdo].transmit_type_parameter = 0;
00773           /* Call  PDOEventTimerAlarm for this TPDO, this will trigger emission et reset timers */
00774           PDOEventTimerAlarm (d, numPdo);
00775           return 0;
00776         }
00777 
00778       default:                 /* other subindex are ignored */
00779         break;
00780       }
00781   return 0;
00782 }
00783 
00784 void
00785 PDOInit (CO_Data * d)
00786 {
00787   /* For each TPDO mapping parameters */
00788   UNS16 pdoIndex = 0x1800;      /* OD index of TDPO */
00789 
00790   UNS16 offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS;
00791   UNS16 lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_TRS;
00792   if (offsetObjdict)
00793     while (offsetObjdict <= lastIndex)
00794       {
00795         /* Assign callbacks to sensible TPDO mapping subindexes */
00796         UNS32 errorCode;
00797         ODCallback_t *CallbackList;
00798         /* Find callback list */
00799         scanIndexOD (d, pdoIndex, &errorCode, &CallbackList);
00800         if (errorCode == OD_SUCCESSFUL && CallbackList)
00801           {
00802             /*Assign callbacks to corresponding subindex */
00803             /* Transmission type */
00804             CallbackList[2] = &TPDO_Communication_Parameter_Callback;
00805             /* Inhibit time */
00806             CallbackList[3] = &TPDO_Communication_Parameter_Callback;
00807             /* Event timer */
00808             CallbackList[5] = &TPDO_Communication_Parameter_Callback;
00809           }
00810         pdoIndex++;
00811         offsetObjdict++;
00812       }
00813 
00814   /* Trigger a non-sync event */
00815   _sendPDOevent (d, 0);
00816 }
00817 
00818 void
00819 PDOStop (CO_Data * d)
00820 {
00821   /* For each TPDO mapping parameters */
00822   UNS8 pdoNum = 0x00;           /* number of the actual processed pdo-nr. */
00823   UNS16 offsetObjdict = d->firstIndex->PDO_TRS;
00824   UNS16 lastIndex = d->lastIndex->PDO_TRS;
00825   if (offsetObjdict)
00826     while (offsetObjdict <= lastIndex)
00827       {
00828         /* Delete TPDO timers */
00829         d->PDO_status[pdoNum].event_timer =
00830           DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].event_timer);
00831         d->PDO_status[pdoNum].inhibit_timer =
00832           DelAlarm (d->PDO_status[pdoNum].inhibit_timer);
00833         /* Reset transmit type parameter */
00834         d->PDO_status[pdoNum].transmit_type_parameter = 0;
00835         d->PDO_status[pdoNum].last_message.cob_id = 0;
00836         pdoNum++;
00837         offsetObjdict++;
00838       }
00839 }
